title: Leading airlines worldwide - based on total number of passengers 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of passengers in millions for 10 number of Airliness.
The maximum Number of passengers in millions 203.7 is found at Airlines American and the minimum is found at Air China where Number of passengers in millions is 110.0.
The highest Airlines American has 93.7 more Number of passengers in millions than the lowest Airlines Air China.
